original: mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dngos po @46a *//
analyzed: mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dngos po @46a *//
translated: the way to satisfy beings

original: thams cad gtang ba dang / yongs su gtang ba dang / sbyin pa bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i tshul du bya ba rnams sems can thams cad la lan la re ba mi mnga' ba dang /
analyzed: thams cad gtang ba dang / yongs su gtang ba dang / sbyin pa bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i tshul du bya ba rnams sems can thams cad la lan la re ba mi mnga' ba dang /
translated: They give everything, they give completely, they give generously, and they act to protect all beings from the uninterrupted suffering of conditioned existence.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'byung ba'i thugs mnga' bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongs su sbyong ba mdzad cing /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'byung ba'i thugs mnga' bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rin po che yongs su sbyong ba mdzad cing /
translated: They purify the precious minds of all beings, for they are impartial toward all beings and do not expect anything in return.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi char dbab pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa las byung ba'i yongs su bsdu ba'i tshul 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyi char dbab pa /
translated: They bring down a rain of provisions in accordance with the wishes of all beings, for they are the means of gathering all the roots of virtue of all the buddhas into a single ocean.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pas thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pas thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa dang /
translated: In every single instant of mind, they accomplish the complete ripening and purification of all sentient beings, one after another, in order to increase the power of the ocean of merit of omniscience for all beings.

original: thugs kyi skad cig re re zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med cing bla na med pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par klubs shing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
analyzed: thugs kyi skad cig re re zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma lus pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med cing bla na med pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pas rnam par klubs shing rab tu brgyan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
translated: In every single instant of mind, they completely perfect the buddha realms, one after another, without exception, adorned with the purest and unsurpassed ornaments.

original: ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi @46b tshul rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang bar rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gtos ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi @46b tshul rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang bar rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gtos ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: to purify the complete and vast ocean of ways of the Dharma in every instant of mind; to perfect the way of wisdom that completely fills the realm of space in every instant of mind;

original: thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can dang dus ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
analyzed: thugs kyi skad cig re re la sems can dang dus ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang /
translated: to purify the way of wisdom that engages all sentient beings and all times in every instant of mind; to attain the appearance of the way of wisdom that completely trains all beings in every instant of mind;

original: thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus ma lus pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa ma lus par yongs su bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus ma lus pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa ma lus par yongs su bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan thogs par bya ba dang /
translated: in every instant of mind, to be skilled in the blessing of omniscient wisdom and to benefit all beings;

original: thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grangs su bya ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thugs kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i grangs su bya ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
translated: in every instant of mind, to have the continuity of the enumeration of all the world systems;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bstan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bstan pa /
translated: to manifest all the oceans of world systems;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba /🔽'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sna tshogs brjod du yod pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sna tshogs brjod du yod pa /
translated: to gather all the oceans of world systems;🔽to have the various descriptions of the infinite world systems;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyis mtshams rnam par 'dul ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par gnas pa sna tshogs kyis mtshams rnam par 'dul ba /
translated: to have the various continuums of world systems that are arranged in the directions;

original: gzhi sna tshogs dang / lhun du mar brjod du @47a *//
analyzed: gzhi sna tshogs dang / lhun du mar brjod du @47a *//
translated: the various bases,🔽the various spontaneous expressions,

original: yod pa / rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa /
analyzed: yod pa / rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi bskal pa rnam pa tha dad pa bstan du yod pa /
translated: the various distinctions, the different eons,

original: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang / gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / che ba dang / yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / gcig tu yongs su dag pa dang / gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / che ba dang / yangs pa dang / tshad med pa dang /
translated: the various afflictions and purities, the purities and afflictions, the complete purities, the complete afflictions, the great, the vast, the immeasurable,

original: dog pa dang / phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / gzhi mnyam pa dang snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mngon par bltas pa dang / phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su yongs su gzhol ba /
analyzed: dog pa dang / phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / gzhi mnyam pa dang snrel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su mngon par bltas pa dang / phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su yongs su gzhol ba /
translated: the narrow, the subtle, the extensive, the even bases, the inverted, the upright, the directions, the intermediate directions, the various oceans of directions,🔽and the various oceans of directions.

original: sgo sna tshogs nas bstan cing sgo mtha' yas pa'i dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i rnam par phye ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod de /
analyzed: sgo sna tshogs nas bstan cing sgo mtha' yas pa'i dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i rnam par phye ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod de /
translated: I will practice bodhisattva conduct in all the oceans of world realms, which have various arrays of various shapes with infinite gates, which are taught through various gates.🔽I will enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas and will fill them with the bodhisattva conduct and emanations.🔽In each instant of mind, I will perceive the activity of the buddhas of the three times in the minds and thoughts of all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongs su mnan nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam🔽par 'phel bar mdzad de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa yongs su mnan nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang bar bya ba dang / thugs kyi skad cig re re la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus pa thams cad sems can pha rol gyi sems dang bsam pas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar mdzad de /
translated: I will increase the power of the ocean of the merit of omniscience in all beings.

original: mngon par sgrub @47b pa mdzad par gyur pas mngon par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par sgrub @47b pa mdzad par gyur pas mngon par shes so //
translated: I will accomplish it. I will manifest it.”

original: rjes su dran no //
analyzed: rjes su dran no //
translated: I remember it.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gnas pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe 'jig rten gnas pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba /
translated: in this way, when the blessed thus-gone Vairocana was practicing bodhisattva conduct in the past, the world was filled with beings who were devoid of the accumulations of merit and wisdom,

original: sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba /
analyzed: sems can byas pa drin du mi gzo bas yongs su gang ba /
translated: who were ungrateful,

original: mi shes pa'i mun pas chod pa; bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa /
analyzed: mi shes pa'i mun pas chod pa; bdag tu bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la mngon par zhen pa /
translated: who were obscured by the darkness of ignorance, who were attached to the notions of “I” and “mine,”

original: ma rig pa'i mun pa rab rib kyis bsgribs pa /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun pa rab rib kyis bsgribs pa /
translated: who were obscured by the darkness of the veil of ignorance,

original: tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la zhugs pa; lta ba thibs po bas dgon par mgo brlags pa /
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa la zhugs pa; lta ba thibs po bas dgon par mgo brlags pa /
translated: who engaged in incorrect thoughts, who were lost in the jungle of views,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo rmongs pa /
translated: who were confused about causes and effects,

original: nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang du gyur pa /
translated: who were under the sway of afflictions and karma,

original: 'khor ba'i mya ngam chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa'i 'og tu lhung ba /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i mya ngam chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa'i 'og tu lhung ba /
translated: and who had fallen into the abyss of the suffering of the great wilderness of saṃsāra.

original: phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
analyzed: phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /

translated: King Sarva­dharma­nirnādacchatra­maṇḍala­nirghoṣa heard the great lamentation of the many beings who were in the assembly, crying out with compassion. He entered into the ten hundred thousand countless doors of great compassion.

translated: When will I become a refuge for those beings who are without refuge, by establishing them in the activity of avoiding misdeeds?

analyzed: 'jig rten na rga shi'i 'jigs pas tshar chod cing mgon med pa lta na /

translated: When will I become a protector for those beings who are without a protector, by removing all the fears of cyclic existence?

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses te rten med pa lta na /
translated: Alas, these beings are tormented by various fears in the world and have no support.

translated: When will I become a support for those who are tormented by the various fears of the world of sentient beings, by establishing them in the path of omniscience, which is completely blissful and faultless?

original: ma rig pa'i mun par 'thom ste the tshom dang / yid gnyis kyi rab @55b rib kyis bsgribs pa lta na /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i mun par 'thom ste the tshom dang / yid gnyis kyi rab @55b rib kyis bsgribs pa lta na /
translated: Alas! These sentient beings are confused in the darkness of ignorance, as if covered by the cataracts of doubt and uncertainty.

analyzed: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel bas sgron mar 'gyur / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /

original: snang ba dang bral ba lta na /
analyzed: snang ba dang bral ba lta na /
translated: Alas! These sentient beings are as if devoid of light.

analyzed: nam zhig bdag ye shes kyi sgo rab rib med pa yongs su ston pas ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'byin par 'gyur /
translated: When will I shine the light of great wisdom, by revealing the immaculate door of wisdom?

original: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: Alas! These sentient beings are as if devoid of light.

translated: Their minds are turbid with the muddiness of jealousy, stinginess, deceit, and pretense, and so they lack the clear color of wisdom.

original: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa la rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur /🔽kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa la rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /

analyzed: 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yul gyi rgyud du zhugs shing 'dren pa med pa lta na /
translated: Alas! These sentient beings have entered the realm of the ocean of cyclic existence and are without a guide.

analyzed: nam zhig bdag sems can chos thams cad chos rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'dzud par gyur cing 'dren par 'ong / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /

analyzed: ma dul zhing rnam par 'dren pa med pa lta na /

analyzed: nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dus las mi 'da' zhing rnam par 'dren par 'ong / kyi hud kye sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: When will I, through the blessing of the tathagatas, become a guide who never misses the time to fully ripen and completely liberate all sentient beings?

analyzed: dmus long du gyur te yongs su 'dren pa med pa lta na / nam zhig bdag sems can thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i thams @56a *//

analyzed: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la 'dzud cing yongs su 'dren par 'gyur /

translated: Having spoken these ten phrases filled with great compassion, he had the great bell rung in the royal palace and beat the great drum of generosity, proclaiming, “I will give whatever anyone needs.

translated: covered with a net of precious gems that illuminated the way of the realm of phenomena,

original: nyi zla dang / gza' skar dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nyi zla dang / gza' skar dang / rgyu skar thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: with a body that was the reflection of all the sun, moon, planets, stars, and constellations,

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: with a body that revealed itself to sentient beings in accordance with their thoughts,

original: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar rang gi lus rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs dang 'dra bar rang gi lus rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: with a body that caused the bodies of all sentient beings to be perceived in the form of her own body,

original: kha dog rgya mtsho yangs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: kha dog rgya mtsho yangs pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmigs par ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that revealed the perception of the vast, endless ocean of colors.

original: spyod lam thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i tshul yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: spyod lam thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i tshul yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that revealed the way of conduct in all postures.

original: sgo kun tu mngon par bltas par rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sgo kun tu mngon par bltas par rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that was perceived from all sides.

original: chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra kun tu sgrog cing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra kun tu sgrog cing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gnas pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that was present before all beings, filling all directions with various manifestations, thundering with the sound of the clouds of the Dharma.

original: dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi don la mngon du bltas par nam mkha'i dbyings kyis glo ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi don la mngon du bltas par nam mkha'i dbyings kyis glo ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that was the sky, facing the purpose of all beings at all times.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He had a body that bowed down and paid homage at the feet of all the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @73b bsags pa la gces shing sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @73b bsags pa la gces shing sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: their bodies were cherished and foremost in the accumulation of the roots of merit of all beings;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon du chos kyi sprin yang dag par len cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems las phyir phyogs su ma gyur cing dran pas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon du chos kyi sprin yang dag par len cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems las phyir phyogs su ma gyur cing dran pas yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: their bodies were held by the mindfulness that was not turned away from the mind that was to be accomplished and perfected, the vow to receive and hold the Dharma clouds directly from all the tathagatas;

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'od kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: their bodies were filled with light that pervaded all directions and subdirections with limitless light;

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od kun tu 'gyed cing snang ba yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od kun tu 'gyed cing snang ba yongs su ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: their bodies emitted the light of the Dharma lamp that removed the darkness of all beings and revealed the light of illumination;

original: chos sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus dri ma med pa rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus dri ma med pa rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: their bodies revealed the stainless body of the wisdom of the illusion-like Dharma;

original: chos kyi lus mun pa dang rdul du bral ba rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi lus mun pa dang rdul du bral ba rab tu ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a body that manifests the body of the Dharma, free from darkness and dust.
